entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of drizzle or light snow late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
